title: L.A. city controller voter guide: Paul Koretz vs. Kenneth Mejia
dc:creator: David Zahniser
description: Two candidates for city controller, Councilmember Paul Koretz and accountant Kenneth Mejia, are locked in one of the most negative campaigns in L.A. this year.
content:encoded: Two candidates for city controller, Councilmember Paul Koretz and accountant Kenneth Mejia, are locked in one of the most negative campaigns in L.A. this year.

media:content.media:description: Diptych of candidates for city controller Paul Koretz, left, and Kenneth Mejia.
